name: Jim Britt
what_you_do: Jim Britt offers a powerful series designed to eliminate subconscious money blocks and reprogram the mind to create wealth through emotional healing and empowerment.
who_you_serve: He serves individuals seeking to overcome financial limitations and achieve success, including entrepreneurs and those interested in personal development.
seeking: Collaborations with coaches, speakers, and entrepreneurs for a book series and marketing strategies.
offering: Access to his audience through seminars, courses, and collaborative projects.
signature_programs: Cracking the Rich Code, Money Reprogramming Series
service_provided: 1:1 coaching, group programs, courses, speaking, consulting
current_projects: Cracking the Rich Code four-month program
bio: #1 best-selling author, recognized as one of the world’s top 20 success coaches, presented seminars to over 2,000,000 people.
business_focus: Jim Britt offers a powerful series designed to eliminate subconscious money blocks and reprogram the mind to create wealth through emotional healing and empowerment. (money coaching)
